name: Crazy Jungle (aguywhocodes)
description:
You are a helicopter pilot, who decides to fly over the lao jungle. Which is a horrible mistake. You teleport and crash on a alien planet, you have to get the 2 pieces of the helicopter to fix it!

Made for LowRezJam 2020

With some help from https://nvidiartxfan.itch.io/

(this is my first game jam, and im not great at making games right now, so dont be too hard on me! :D )
